basics.name: Kaled Garrido Fiallo
basics.label: SENIOR DEVELOPER
basics.summary: Kaled is a full stack software engineer. He has over 4 years of professional experience, during that time he has participated in different projects from mobile applications to banking and financial sector projects. During his career, Kaled has developed Backend services, websites and Android mobile apps. He has good relationships with his co-workers and he likes to learn and help whenever is possible. In 2012, he created the first Android App with a Route Calculator for Transmilenio, and because of that he was mentioned in several publications and received multiple awards.. Kaled is very passionate, committed and responsible with his work.

work.summary: Samtel is a company that provides its services to financial companies, including Santander Bank, ATH, AV Villas Bank and others. Kaled has developed multiple applications for those companies.
highlights: Learned how to operate Postgres in production environments
Improved EJB, JSF, JPA, Glassfish Server
He learned about security concepts and how to apply them to software projects

work.summary: Kaled started this company with the Project Manager and the Tech Leader of Glokal Consulting. In Essentialtec Kaled helped creating and building some of the company products
highlights: Added support for push notifications to an Android App.
Implemented a QR Code reader for Android
Provided support for a couple of applications for BBVA.
Technologies: Java, Android, Google App Engine, Google Cloud Messaging

work.summary: Kaled leaded a team for rebuilting the fronted of a corporate application.
highlights: Thanks to his good job he was invited to a start a new company with the leader of the company
Technologies: Java, Python, DB2, HTML, CSS

work.summary: Kaled created the first and best mobile application for Transmilenio at the time
highlights: Kaled Garrido was a founder and developer of this project.
The android App had 40.000 downloads and 10.000 active users
It was the first App with the route calculator for an Android device in Bogota
Kaled created the algorithm to calculate the optimal route to travel from a point A to B, based on time and date

In April 2012, Enter.co, the most important tech magazine in Colombia, wrote an article comparing all Transmilenio apps from the time. In the article they said "Buscar Ruta Trasmilenio Bog" is more functional than other analyzed App. http://www.enter.co/especiales/universoandroid/no-se-vuelva-a-perder-en-en-transmilenio-con-estas-apps-para-android/

volunteer.summary: Kaled Garrido developed a python app to automatize fetching weather data for more than 150 cities. The program produced a report with this information.

awards.title: Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 7 Programmer

publications.name: No se vuelva a perder en Transmilenio
Las rutas de Transmilenio en su telefono
No se vuelva a perder en Transmilenio
